divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to walk my dog and i saw a yellow eggshaped flame coming towards me. I thought it was the sun coming down onto the earth. Then i became blinded by an EXTREMELY bright yellow flash , almost like a camera. I began feeling a hyper sensation. MY dog began barking and he ran away, but i couldn't chase after him because i felt frozen. When it finally went away i could move again. I went inside it was already three in the morning , even though it only felt as though it lasted several seconds. Ever since that day i've had very dry eyes and have had to keep reappplying eyedrops every hour to moisten them. It was the scariest most disturbing event OF MY LIFE !!!!
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around February 22nd 2011
